AEM Auto Version Creator: Automate Versioning in Adobe Experience Manager (AEM)
Introduction
In today's digital landscape, maintaining data integrity and version control across web content is critical. The "AEM Auto Version Creator" Chrome extension offers a robust solution by automating the process of versioning every page in Adobe Experience Manager (AEM), thereby enhancing efficiency and ensuring data security.
